summary: Consume Sentry.io API to manage events, issues, organizations, projects, releases, and teams.

parameters.name: sentry version
parameters.description: Select the Sentry version to connect to (Cloud or Self-Hosted).

parameters.name: authentication
parameters.description: Select the authentication method to use (Access Token or OAuth2).

parameters.name: resource
parameters.description: Select the type of resource to interact with (Event, Issue, Organization, Project, Release, Team, or make a Custom API Call).

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: Select the operation to perform on the chosen resource (e.g., Get event by ID, Get many events, or make a Custom API Call).

parameters.name: organization slug name or ID
parameters.description: The slug of the organization the events belong to. Required for fetching events.
